meanings.definition: To devote (time, effort, or oneself) to a particular task or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She is dedicating her time to helping others in need.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys dedicating his weekends to gardening.
meanings.sent3: The cat is dedicating its energy to catching the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: The sun dedicating its rays to warming the earth.
meanings.sent5: Dedicating all your focus to studying can lead to success.

meanings.definition: To set apart for a specific purpose or use.
meanings.sent1: They are dedicating a room in the house for their home office.
meanings.sent2: The park is dedicating a section for picnics and gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel is dedicating a tree branch as its personal lookout spot.
meanings.sent4: The chef is dedicating a corner of the kitchen for baking supplies.
meanings.sent5: Dedicating a shelf for books can help keep them organized.
